title: Ravens to be without Lamar for 3rd game in row
content: The Ravens will be without quarterback Lamar Jackson for the third straight game as he continues to deal with a hamstring injury. Tyler Huntley will get the start for Sunday's home game against the Bears.

title: Luka sets Lakers mark with 92 points to open year
content: Luka Doncic continued his torrid start to the season, scoring 49 points in a 128-110 win over the Timberwolves to give him a franchise-record 92 points through the first two games.

title: Sources: Falcons highly likely to start Cousins
content: Kirk Cousins is "highly likely" to be the Falcons' starting quarterback against the Dolphins, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter, as Michael Penix Jr. deals with a bone bruise in his left knee.

title: Commanders' McLaurin, Samuel to play vs. Chiefs
content: The Commanders will finally have both of their top two receivers available Monday as Terry McLaurin and Deebo Samuel will play vs. Kansas City.

title: Jays use 9-run 6th to bury L.A. in statement win
content: The Blue Jays showed they are a powerhouse in their own right Friday night, putting Game 1 of the World Series away with a nine-run sixth inning and beating the Dodgers 11-4.

title: Mavs 0-2 as 'Fire Nico!' chants grow loud again
content: Many Mavericks fans vented their frustration by again chanting "Fire Nico!" as the final minute played out in a 117-107 loss to the Wizards that dropped Dallas to 0-2 on the season.

title: Jays fans hit Ohtani with 'don't need you' chants
content: Blue Jays fans let Shohei Ohtani hear it before and during Game 1 of the World Series, their disapproval of him not picking their team in free agency in 2023 clearly still evident.

title: No. 7 Georgia Tech down 3 starters vs. Syracuse
content: No. 7 Georgia Tech will be without three starters -- wide receiver Malik Rutherford, center Harrison Moore and nickelback Jy Gilmore -- against Syracuse.

title: UFC 321 Abu Dhabi live analysis and results
content: Follow live with the UFC 321 card, headlined by heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall against Ciryl Gane.

title: X-ray tables, marked cards and the Mafia: How the FBI says poker games were rigged
content: Details of how poker games, some involving Chauncey Billups, were allegedly rigged to make people lose big.

title: Catch up with our last-minute predictions, fantasy sleepers, more
content: Big game for Derrick Henry? Alec Pierce's first TD of the season? More fantasy upside for Joe Flacco? Here's what to know for Week 8.

title: NFC East roundtable: Can the defending champs take the division crown again?
content: So far, every team in the NFC East except the Eagles has played three division games. Here's how they stack up.

title: Giants-Eagles rivalry and the punt that lives in NFL infamy
content: DeSean Jackson and Matt Dodge relive a 15-year-old shank and a walk-off return that fans will never forget.

title: Thamel: Five questions that will define a wild CFB coaching carousel
content: Big-money buyouts, big-name candidates and more coaches under pressure. Let's break down college football's biggest coaching questions.

title: WWE 'SmackDown' highlights: McIntyre heats up title match against Rhodes
content: Friday's "SmackDown" set up a perfect "Saturday Night's Main Event," with Drew McIntyre and Cody Rhodes ready for the challenge.

title: Last-minute pickups: Bucs duo of Tez Johnson, Cade Otton among top Week 8 options
content: If this heavy bye week or injuries have you seeking lineup help, we have available options to consider.

title: Mbappé vs. Yamal is the new Ronaldo vs. Messi -- so which Clasico star is better?
content: Not since Messi vs. Ronaldo has the Barcelona-Real Madrid rivalry given us a matchup like Yamal vs. Mbappe. So, which superstar would you rather have?

title: Madrid vs. Barça head-to-head, form, key clashes, predictions, odds
content: When Real Madrid and Barcelona face off, there's nothing bigger happening anywhere in the soccer world.

title: Shock USWNT loss shows lack of problem-solving, but no cause for alarm (yet)
content: The surprising loss to Portugal by the U.S. women's national team came from players who admit they were "on islands" and "trying to fix it on their own."

title: Piastri: Norris & I have 'clean slate' in Mexico
content: Oscar Piastri has confirmed that he and McLaren teammate Lando Norris are starting from a "clean slate" at the Mexican Grand Prix after the Australian took responsibility for their collision at the U.S. Grand Prix.

title: NBA intel: Wemby's new game plan, and early concerns for Lakers and Rockets
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst take the pulse of the league after a thrilling first few nights of 2025-26.

title: Top 100 men's NCAA basketball players going into 2025-26
content: From seniors who have taken the national stage before to freshmen entering the spotlight, here is our 1-100.

title: Bilas' 2025 preseason All-America teams
content: From three transfers on the first team to four freshmen on the second, here are Jay Bilas' All-America teams.

title: Steelers' 1933 striped throwbacks, Chargers' navy look top NFL Week 8 uniforms
content: It's the debut of a throwback uniform for the Steelers in Week 8, while the Eagles will also be wearing kelly green.

title: NFL Week 8's fashionable arrivals, featuring Justin Jefferson
content: From suits to streetwear, Week 8's arrivals mixed personal flair and cold-weather layers with comfort and creativity.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United optimistic over Hjulmand deal
content: Manchester United are optimistic they can secure a deal to sign Sporting CP midfielder Morten Hjulmand. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: 'Boost For Local Artistes Too': J&K Lt Governor To NDTV Good Times On Sonu Nigam Concert
content: NDTV Good Times has reached Jammu and Kashmir with a massive star-studded concert where Sonu Nigam will perform.

title: Louvre Transfers Some Of Its Most Precious Jewels To Bank Of France: Report
content: The Louvre has transferred some of its most precious jewels to the Bank of France after an audacious daylight heist last week exposed the famed museum's security vulnerability.

title: Woman Leaves Mid-Argument, Her Husband Slits Their Twin Daughters' Throats
content: A man in Maharashtra quarrelled with his wife. As soon as the woman left for her parents' home during the argument, the man took his two-year-old twin daughters to a forested area, slit their throats.

title: 5 Children With Thalassemia Test HIV-Positive In Jharkhand
content: Four more children suffering from thalassemia were detected HIV-positive in Jharkhand's Chaibasa town on Saturday during an investigation by a five-member medical team from Ranchi, taking the total number of affected minors to five.

title: Over 40 Escape After Bus Catches Fire Near Ranchi, Short Circuit Suspected
content: Over 40 passengers had a narrow escape as a moving bus caught fire in Ranchi on Saturday evening, police said. The incident happened on the Ranchi-Lohardaga highway when the bus was heading to Chatra from the state capital, they said.

title: In Doctor Suicide Case, Father's Death Penalty Appeal To Devendra Fadnavis
content: The father of the 26-year-old doctor who died by suicide in Maharashtra's Satara has sought the death penalty for the culprits responsible for her daughter's death.

title: Multi-Crore 'Iridium' Scam Busted In Tamil Nadu, 27 Arrested
content: In a major crackdown on a large-scale financial fraud, the Crime Branch police of Tamil Nadu arrested 27 more people for their involvement in the multi-crore "Iridium scam" that duped people across the state by misusing the name of the RBI

title: Actor Files PIL In Bengaluru Tunnel Project, BJP MP Tejaswi Surya Argues Case
content: The Tunnel Road Project in Bengaluru has come under judicial scrutiny after actor Prakash Belawadi filed a Public Interest Litigation in the Karnataka High Court.

title: 2 Die, Several Injured In Mass Shooting At Party In US' North Carolina
content: A shooting at a large weekend party in southeastern North Carolina killed two people and critically wounded several others, a sheriff said Saturday.

title: Chaos, Lathicharge, And A Helmeted MLA: Fertiliser Fury In Madhya Pradesh
content: Madhya Pradesh is witnessing a massive uproar over a fertiliser shortage, with angry farmers clashing with authorities, and even an MLA forced to stand in line for hours in protest.

title: 'Bihar Ka Nayak' Posters On Tejashwi Yadav Prompt BJP's 'Khalnayak' Jibe
content: A fresh political storm erupted in Bihar after posters calling RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav "Bihar ka Nayak" appeared across Patna. The BJP launched a sharp counterattack, accusing Tejashwi and his family of being involved in corruption cases

title: Girls In School Uniform Try To Buy Alcohol, Get It Without A Hitch
content: A video shows girl students in school uniforms buying alcohol from a government liquor shop in Nainpur in Mandla district district of Madhya Pradesh.

title: Nagpur-Delhi Air India Flight Returns After Bird Hit, Passengers Safe
content: An Air India flight from Nagpur to Delhi returned to Nagpur shortly after take-off on October 24 following a bird-hit, an Air India spokesperson said.

title: US, China Had "Very Constructive" Trade Talks Ahead Of Trump-Xi Meet: Official
content: The United States and China conducted "very constructive" trade talks in Malaysia on Saturday, a US Treasury spokesman said, ahead of a highly anticipated meeting of their leaders in South Korea next week.

title: Trump Heads To Asia For Trade Talks With Xi, Kim Jong Un Meeting Possible
content: US President Donald Trump headed for Asia on Saturday and high-stakes trade talks with Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping, saying that he would also like to meet North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on his trip.

title: On Bihar Opposition's Deputy Chief Minister Pick, A Owaisi's Muslim Question
content: In the colourful mosaic of Bihar's political landscape, where the holy Ganges and its tributaries flow with a history of resilience and renewal, and where democratic competition for votes has brought about a social churn.

title: Cough, Headaches: 3 In 4 Delhi-NCR Homes Feeling Air Impact, Finds Survey
content: Three out of four households in Delhi-NCR are already experiencing the ill-effects of toxic air, with common complaints ranging from sore throat and cough to burning eyes, headaches and disturbed sleep, according to an online survey

title: 2 Tribal Minors Gang Raped In Odisha, 3 Suspects In Custody
content: Two tribal girls were allegedly gang-raped by five men in Odisha's Mayurbhanj district when they were returning home along with their friends, police said on Saturday.

title: Andhra On Alert As Cyclone Montha Likely To Cross Kakinada Coast On Tuesday
content: With the India Meteorological Department (IMD) forecasting that Cyclone Montha is likely to cross the coast near Kakinada on October 28, Chief Secretary K Vijayanand has instructed all district collectors and officials to remain on high alert

title: US Singer Mary Millben Calls PM Modi 'Good Friend,' Praises His Leadership
content: American singer and actress Mary Millben, known for her cultural diplomacy, expressed her deep admiration and respect for Prime Minister Narendra Modi, calling him "a good friend" and praising his leadership both in India and on the global stage

title: Canada visa crisis: Refusal rate crosses 50%; court filings skyrocket - what's going on?
content: Canada's immigration system is experiencing an unprecedented surge in visa and permit refusals, leading to widespread concerns about automated decision-making replacing human assessment. This crisis is fueling a significant rise in judicial reviews as applicants challenge decisions deemed generic and unreasonable, with numbers of new temporary residents, particularly students, declining sharply.

title: ‘Unforeseen factors rising’: Xi sounds alarm – key challenges loom as China sets 5-yr plan
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping warned of rising uncertainties as the Communist Party approved its next five-year plan, emphasizing technological innovation and economic restructuring. The blueprint, personally shaped by Xi, aims to strengthen China's domestic market and "real economy" amidst global volatility and domestic headwinds.

title: Bihar polls: Early sunset for Jan Suraaj? 3 key battles facing the 'challenger'
content: Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj party faces significant hurdles in Bihar's upcoming elections. Candidate desertions and worker discontent plague the new political force. Both ruling alliances and opposition accuse Jan Suraaj of being a 'B team,' raising questions about its electoral viability and potential to act as a spoiler.

title: Nod of the head and a warm hug - How Rohit & Virat gave fans goosebumps
content: Rohit Sharma's 50th international century, a remarkable 33rd in ODIs, was a testament to his enduring class and resilience. Partnering with Virat Kohli, he anchored India's chase with an unbeaten 121, securing a memorable win. This historic feat, coupled with strong bowling, showcased India's dominance and the enduring magic of their batting stalwarts.

title: Af-Pak conflict: Islamabad warns Kabul of 'open war'; peace talks under way
content: Pakistan's defence Minister warned of potential "open war" with Afghanistan if ongoing Istanbul talks fail to secure a lasting peace agreement. The discussions follow deadly border clashes, with both nations seeking to prevent a relapse into violence after the Taliban's 2021 takeover. An immediate ceasefire was reportedly agreed upon, but tensions remain high.

title: ‘13,000x faster’: Sundar Pichai hails ‘verifiable quantum edge’; Elon Musk reacts
content: Google's Willow chip has achieved a verifiable quantum advantage, running a new algorithm 13,000 times faster than the best supercomputers. This breakthrough, named Quantum Echoes, can explain atomic interactions and paves the way for drug discovery and materials science. The verifiable result marks a significant step towards real-world quantum computing applications.

title: Satara suicide case: CM Fadnavis vows strict action; warns against 'politicising issue'
content: Maharashtra chief minister Devendra Fadnavis has promised swift action regarding the suicide of a woman doctor in Satara. He stated that police officials involved have been suspended and arrests are being made. The doctor died by suicide on Friday, leaving a note on her hand naming two individuals, including a police official. Relatives allege pressure for incorrect post-mortem reports.

title: Rana 'ignores' Gill, listens to Rohit Sharma; picks up a wicket moments later
content: Pacer Harshit Rana shared a humorous on-field chat with Shubman Gill and Rohit Sharma during India's ODI win against Australia. Rana dismissed Mitchell Owen after a playful exchange about field placements, highlighting Rohit's experienced advice. This moment highlighted Rohit's value to the team as India secured a dominant nine-wicket victory.

title: ‘Patently excessive’: JP Morgan fumes as it foots $60 m bill for founder; calls fees ‘abuse’
content: JPMorgan Chase is reportedly seeking to end its obligation to pay legal fees for Charlie Javice, the founder of Frank, who was found guilty of defrauding the bank. Despite a contract clause, JPMorgan argues the $60.1 million already advanced for her defense and appeal is "patently excessive and egregious," citing multiple law firms and high hourly rates.

title: 'Few more kilos down...' - Abhishek Nayar reveals Rohit is on a weight-loss mission
content: Rohit Sharma, after a match-winning century in Sydney, hinted that this might be his and Virat Kohli's final tour of Australia. Sharma's unbeaten 121 marked his 50th international century and third-highest ODI run tally for India. His resurgence is attributed to three months of dedicated training and a strict fitness regime.

title: ‘Not robust enough’: Airbnb CEO says ChatGPT can’t yet power platform; hints at future use
content: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky expressed interest in integrating OpenAI's ChatGPT, but found its current SDK insufficient for their needs. While Airbnb already uses AI, the trend favors customizable open-source models, with Chinese tech giants like Alibaba leading the charge by releasing advanced, cost-effective systems and fostering a vast open-source AI ecosystem.

title: Pak’s economy collapsing? Public debt rises to $286.8 bn; debt-to-GDP ratio hits 70%
content: Pakistan's public debt surged to $286.832 billion by June 2025, a nearly 13% increase from the previous year, pushing the debt-to-GDP ratio to 70%. This rise is attributed to lower-than-expected GDP growth and subdued inflation. Despite these challenges, the economy shows signs of recovery with IMF support and improved external reserves.

title: 'You can call me Raja': Indian-origin Congressman shuts down 'racist' Florida leader
content: Chandler Langevin is a member of the Palm Bay City Council who made headlines because of his hateful statements against Indians. He said Indians in America only care for benefiting their countries and hence they should be ousted. This led to a massive controversy and the city council voted for the elimination of Langevin from the council.

title: Satish Shah remembered late Shammi Kapoor in his last tweet
content: Satish Shah, known for his role in 'Sarabhai vs Sarabhai', passed away at 74 due to kidney failure. His last tweet was a tribute to Shammi Kapoor, prompting fans to offer condolences and draw parallels between the two actors' legacies. Prime Minister Narendra Modi also expressed his grief.

title: Brittany Mahomes makes statement in Patrick Mahomes-themed outfit
content: Brittany Mahomes showcased her ultimate NFL WAG style at Arrowhead Stadium, wearing a bold gray-green sweater featuring Patrick Mahomes' face front and back. She paired the eye-catching top with a matching mini skirt and thigh-high boots, accessorizing with luxury items. This fashion statement highlights her devoted game-day spirit and continues her streak of stylish appearances.

title: Cardi B opens up on Offset marriage regrets during pregnancy with Diggs
content: Cardi B is preparing to welcome her fourth child with Stefon Diggs while navigating a difficult divorce from Offset. She recently expressed her wish for Offset to be a better person for their children, acknowledging his past infidelity. Offset has since admitted to cheating, taking responsibility for his "bad decisions."

title: Ayesha Curry surprises fans with custom warriors gift amid divorce rumors
content: Stephen Curry kicked off the NBA season with a stellar performance, leading the Warriors to victory. Meanwhile, his wife Ayesha received a unique, custom-designed Warriors jersey from Kristin Juszczyk. Ayesha's social media posts, including one referencing "Year 17," sparked fan confusion, while recent divorce rumors were debunked, with Ayesha clarifying her past views on marriage and motherhood.

title: Hospital reveals Satish Shah was found unresponsive at home; last rites to be held tomorrow
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah, known for his unforgettable performances in Sarabhai vs Sarabhai and Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro, passed away at the age of 74 on October 25. The actor, who had reportedly been unwell for the past few months, breathed his last due to kidney failure.

title: Happy Chhath Puja 2025: Wishes, messages, quotes & images
content: Chhath Puja, a sacred and eco-friendly festival dedicated to Surya Dev and Chhathi Maiya, will be celebrated from October 25-28, 2025. This four-day observance, prominent in Bihar, Jharkhand, and Uttar Pradesh, involves rituals like Nahay Khay, Kharna, Sandhya Arghya, and Usha Arghya.

title: When will Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma play next for India?
content: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli ended India's Australia tour with a dominant nine-wicket win, with Rohit scoring an unbeaten 121 and Kohli 74 not out in the 3rd ODI. Despite their stellar performance, questions linger about their future in the 50-over format, with their next ODI appearance anticipated in the home series against South Africa.

title: Nina Lin and Zoe Spencer banned from Twitch over assault allegations
content: Twitch has banned popular streamers Nina Lin and Zoe Spencer following a viral video allegedly showing them assaulting FaZe Silky's assistant. The footage, which circulated widely, depicted inappropriate actions leading to immediate backlash. Lin has since apologized, admitting her conduct was wrong, while Spencer has remained silent. The platform's swift action has sparked debate online.

title: Trade, Xi & Kim: Trump starts Asia tour; what's on the agenda
content: President Trump begins his first Asia tour of his second term, visiting Malaysia, Japan, and South Korea. The trip aims to restore economic balance and reaffirm US influence, with key meetings planned with Chinese President Xi Jinping and potentially North Korean leader Kim Jong Un.  The tour includes trade negotiations, peace accords, and investment commitments.

title: 'Gharwale bhi bol rahe hai ...' - Why Gill gave this reply during PC
content: India's 18-match ODI toss losing streak continued as Australia won the toss and batted first. Captain Gill light-heartedly addressed the streak, emphasising the team's confident, no-pressure environment. He also praised Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's match-winning partnership in India's nine-wicket victory.

title: 'True legend': PM Modi mourns veteran actor Satish Shah; hails 'iconic wit'
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah, a legend of Indian entertainment, has passed away at 74. Known for his iconic roles in films like 'Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro' and the beloved TV show 'Sarabhai vs Sarabhai', Shah brought laughter to millions with his impeccable comic timing and versatility.

title: Jharkhand shock: 7-yr-old tests HIV+, kin blame blood bank; probe underway
content: A seven-year-old thalassemia patient in Jharkhand has tested HIV-positive, leading to an investigation into allegations of contaminated blood transfusion from the local blood bank. A five-member team from Ranchi is probing the incident, examining blood donors and the blood bank's procedures. While the family suspects the blood bank, authorities caution against premature conclusions, noting other potential infection routes.

title: BCCI breaks silence after Australia Women cricketers molested in Indore
content: Two Australian cricketers faced inappropriate behaviour in Indore, prompting a strong condemnation from the BCCI. The accused motorcyclist was swiftly arrested by local police. The BCCI Secretary emphasized India's hospitality and zero tolerance for such acts, assuring a review of safety protocols to protect visiting teams. The incident occurred near the players' hotel.

title: MP shocker: 2 Australian cricketers stalked, molested in Indore
content: Two Australian cricketers were allegedly followed and molested by a man in Indore while returning to their hotel. The incident occurred on Thursday morning, prompting the team's security manager to file a complaint. Police have identified and booked a suspect following a CCTV footage review.

title: Travis Hunter’s wife Leanna shares powerful Bible message amid rising fame
content: As Travis Hunter navigates his rookie NFL season, his wife Leanna Lenee is finding strength in faith amidst public attention. She shared a Bible passage emphasizing hope and kindness, a message praised by followers. The couple recently welcomed their first child, balancing family life with the pressures of fame.

title: Veteran actor Satish Shah passes away due to kidney failure at 74
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah, celebrated for his iconic roles in 'Sarabhai Vs Sarabhai' and films like 'Jaane Bhi Do Yaar', has passed away at 74. The beloved performer succumbed to kidney-related issues after being admitted to Hinduja hospital. Filmmaker Ashoke Pandit confirmed the tragic news, mourning a significant loss to the Indian entertainment industry.

title: Vintage Ro-Ko at SCG! India crush Australia by 9 wickets in style
content: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli delivered a vintage performance at the SCG, guiding India to a nine-wicket victory in the third ODI against Australia. Sharma notched his 50th international century with an unbeaten 121, while Kohli remained 74 not out. Their unbroken 168-run partnership secured the win, potentially marking a memorable farewell for the legends Down Under.

title: Over 12k trains to be run for festival season -check list of trains, routes & more
content: Indian Railways has deployed over 12,075 special trains to manage the festive season rush, particularly around Diwali and Chhath Puja. These services, a 56% increase from last year, aim to ensure safe and timely travel for over 30 lakh passengers, with enhanced amenities at major stations.

title: Satish Shah dies at 74: Understanding kidney failure and its warning signs
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah, celebrated for his comedic brilliance and iconic roles in "Yeh Jo Hai Zindagi" and "Sarabhai vs Sarabhai," has passed away at 74 due to kidney failure. His health rapidly deteriorated after being admitted to Hinduja Hospital. The article also outlines the signs and causes of kidney failure.

title: 'Two ducks out of pond': Shastri roasts Kohli for back-to-back noughts in AUS
content: Ravi Shastri took a playful dig at Virat Kohli after he, along with Rohit Sharma led India to a nine-wicket win against Australia in the third ODI.  Despite Australia's early efforts, India's bowlers contained the hosts, enabling the veteran duo to secure a commanding victory. This win provided a significant morale boost for India, concluding the series on a positive note.

title: 'Not going to be easy': Rohit Sharma's honest confession after Sydney ODI win
content: Rohit Sharma's 50th international century and Virat Kohli's unbeaten 74 guided India to a commanding nine-wicket victory in the third ODI against Australia. Despite losing the series 2-1, the duo's stellar partnership ensured India avoided a whitewash, with Sharma also named Player of the Series.

title: Indian-origin trucker crash: Florida moves Supreme Court over immigrant CDLs
content: An Indian-origin truck driver, Harjinder Singh, accused in a fatal Florida crash, reportedly failed his CDL test ten times before obtaining a license. This incident has intensified the debate over issuing commercial licenses to undocumented immigrants, with Florida petitioning the Supreme Court against such policies.

title: Cam Whitmore confirms romance with viral Hollywood singer in steamy IG post
content: Rapper BIA, 34, has publicly confirmed her relationship with 21-year-old NBA player Cam Whitmore through a social media kissing video. The Houston Rockets draftee, now with the Washington Wizards, and the Massachusetts femcee are making headlines for their romance, despite the 13-year age difference. Both appear focused on their respective careers.

title: Delhi prepares for Chhath: With rain over, froth back in Yamuna; pollution rises
content: The aftermath of the monsoon has unveiled troubling pollution levels in Delhi's Yamuna River, with frothing reemerging alongside a troubling spike in faecal coliform and BOD metrics. In a bid to combat this issue, authorities have made efforts to beautify the ghats for Chhath festivities and orchestrated water releases from Haryana. However, environmentalists emphasize that these measures are merely stopgaps.

title: Virat Kohli walks away: Happy ending to a beautiful story
content: India beat Australia by nine wickets to finish the three-match ODI series 2-1. With Rohit Sharma scoring 121, Virat Kohli's unbeaten 74 in his potential final Australian innings secured India's victory, averting a whitewash. The veteran batter, a consistent performer Down Under, leaves a remarkable legacy with numerous centuries and impressive averages across formats, etching unforgettable moments at the Sydney Cricket Ground.

title: Bihar polls: Tejashwi vows state development; calls Nitish 'incapable of leading'
content: Tejashwi Yadav promises to transform Bihar into a leading state by attracting investments and establishing factories. He pledges government jobs for every family within 20 months and Rs 30,000 annually for women. Yadav criticizes the NDA government and vows to bring development to Bihar if the INDIA bloc wins power.

title: IND vs AUS: Only behind Tendulkar! Kohli rewrites record books at SCG
content: Virat Kohli achieved another significant milestone, becoming the second-highest run-scorer in ODI history, surpassing Kumar Sangakkara. He also equaled Sachin Tendulkar's record for most 50+ scores against Australia in ODIs. Kohli's composed half-century anchored India's chase, showcasing his prowess as a "Chasemaster".

title: Satish Shah passes away at 74: Fans pay tribute to 'Dilwale Dulhaniya Le Jayenge' actor
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah, celebrated for his comedic roles in 'Sarabhai Vs Sarabhai' and 'Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro', has passed away at 74. The actor, who had been battling kidney issues, left a lasting legacy in Indian cinema and television. His demise has prompted widespread tributes from fans remembering his memorable performances and the laughter he brought to audiences.

title: Power demand in State expected to exceed 19,000 MW by 2026: Navin Mittal
content: Instructs Chief Engineers and Superintending Engineers to complete all planned line repairs, installation of new transformers and other developmental works by December

title: Sharp decline in complaints received by Lokpal
content: The data available on the Lokpal’s website reveals that the Lokpal has ordered preliminary inquiries in only 289 cases against all the complaints it has received till now

title: Consumer group accuses Hescom of misusing review to hike tariffs
content: The Balakedarara Hitarakshaka Sangha, led by its president G.G. Hegde Kadekodi, filed the objection before the Karnataka Electricity Regulatory Commission. The group has opined that Hescom’s review petition is ‘not maintainable in law’ and ‘an appeal in disguise’.

title: Vigyan Shri winner from Kerala has his sight set on Next Gen Launch Vehicle
content: Jayan N., project director of NGLV at the Vikram Sarabhai Space Centre, wins the award in the Space Science and Technology category for his contributions to developing cryogenic engines

title: Rice institute issues field-ready flood management advice for samba, thaladi
content: Excess water should be drained without delay and completely damaged patches be gap-filled with seedlings of the same variety where possible: K. Subrahmaniyan, TRRI Director

title: Watch: Why a young woman doctor’s alleged suicide points to a deeper systemic rot in Maharashtra
content: Recently, a young woman doctor allegedly died by suicide in Maharashtra’s Satara district. One of the two prime suspects, a police officer allegedly named as a rapist, is absconding.

title: Ensure milk, eggs are supplied in prescribed quantity in anganwadis, says SHRC
content: Directive to Women and Child Development dept. director to enforce guidelines issued for effective implementation of Poshaka Balyam in anganwadis

title: Railway Protection Force steps up video surveillance on general coaches
content: ‘The primary objective of the move is to deter people who board trains with criminal intentions from committing offences’

title: Centre announces Rashtriya Vigyan Puraskar for scientific achievements
content: Physicist Jayant Narlikar, who passed away earlier this year, will be conferred Vigyan Ratna posthumously

title: Amit Shah seeks the blessings of Bihar voters for another five years
content: He also wishes the people on the State’s biggest festival, the ‘Chhath’, that began with Nahay Khay on October 25.

title: Procurement of paddy is on in full swing across Delta districts, say officials
content: Tiruvarur, Mayiladuthurai, and Nagpattinam districts alone have accounted for procurement of  3,98,636 tonnes with a total of ₹970.74 crore paid to bank accounts of 66,245 farmers

title: As Cyclone Montha looms, IMD issues alerts for Andhra Pradesh
content: Red alert has been issued for at least 12 districts on October 28 and 29; the well-marked low-pressure area is likely to intensify into a deep depression by October 26 and into a cyclonic storm  by October 27, and then into a severe cyclonic storm by October 28 and cross the Andhra Pradesh coast between Machilipatnam and Kalingapatnam, says the weatherman

title: Bihar election: Woman’s identity is often tied to her male relative, says CPI(ML)’s Digha candidate Divya Gautam
content: Her connection to deceased actor Sushant Singh Rajput, who was her cousin, has become a talking point. Ms. Gautam, a theatre actor and PhD scholar of gender studies hopes that the narrative will soon turn to her work

title: Families of Indians stuck in Russian warzone say they last heard from them 50-days ago
content: At least two Indians have been killed in the Russia-Ukraine war since September, and the body of one of them arrived from Russia on October 18; the MEA had said previously that it had taken up the matter with Russian authorities and insisted that the practice of recruiting Indians in the war be ended and that ‘our nationals be released’

title: Tensions mount in Aligarh over religious slogan written on temple walls
content: Local police register case against 7 people in some villages of the U.P. district; right-wing activists demand action against culprits

title: PM SHRI won’t alter curriculum of Kerala schools: Minister
content: PM SHRI agreement signed to utilise Central funds for improving physical infrastructure of schools and not to surrender the State’s syllabus to the Union government, says Sivankutty.

title: Collector urges officials to enforce road safety rules, identify accident-prone areas
content: Between January and September this year, 429 road accidents occurred in the Sri Sathya Sai district, resulting in 255 casualties and 483 injuries, says Shyam Prasad

title: Government will take steps to protect conventional media amid digital disruption: I&B Minister
content: The Registrar of Newspapers for India, the Press Information Bureau, and the Central Bureau of Communication would soon be integrated for efficient coordination and convergence across media outreach and regulatory functions, Ashwini Vaishnaw said

title: Bihar’s Gaura-Bauram goes to VIP in last minute seat-sharing deal, RJD candidate refuses to withdraw
content: Confusion reigned over the ‘bizarre situation for voters’, with the RJD’s Afzal Ali Khan refusing to step aside for Santosh Sahani, younger brother of Vikassheel Insaan Party founder Mukesh Sahani

title: CPI signals hesitancy in accepting CPI(M)’s olive branch on PM SHRI row
content: General Education Minister V. Sivankutty calls on CPI State secretary Binoy Viswam to clarify matters and says talks have been cordial and helped clear the air. CPI leader and Civil Supplies Minister G.R. Anil says Minister owes the public an explanation why he inked an agreement the Cabinet had set aside twice, given its political and policy implications

title: BJP’s day-night blockade in Thiruvananthapuram over gold theft case concludes
content: Party State president Rajeev Chandrasekhar says BJP will continue agitation till the perpetrators are put in jail

title: Unified land use code and State land bank to be introduced: Minister K. Rajan
content: State land bank will serve as a centralised digital system identifying government-owned, but unused land across Kerala and unified land use code will consolidate around ten existing land-related laws into a single, comprehensive legal framework

title: Minister exhorts leaders of ruling parties to gear up for local body elections
content: Ruling party leaders should thwart the misinformation campaign unleashed by YSRCP leaders Perni Venkataramaiah and Jogi Ramesh, says Kollu Ravindra

title: College students to help monitor traffic violations with new ‘Police Marshals’ feature on ASTraM app
content: BTP will partner with the Aarohan Foundation, which runs the ‘Police Marshals’ initiative aimed at conducting drug awareness campaigns among college students

title: ‘Saddle-Borne Warriors’ to ride to Himalayan pass in memory of fallen Assam Rifles soldiers
content: Chinese soldiers had ambushed an Assam Rifles patrol at Tulung La in Arunachal Pradesh, killing four riflemen

title: Kurnool tragedy: over 100 cell phones were being transported in the ill-fated bus
content: Fire accident occurred between 2.55 a.m. and 3 a.m.; APFSL officials collect 83 samples from the burnt bus

title: Kerala to prepare oil spill crisis management plan
content: The Ministry of Defence has directed the State to notify the plan.  PCB chairperson says a Bengaluru-based agency has been selected to prepare the plan. The agency will first study the characteristics of the K

title: Moolamattom power plant to be shut down for a  month for maintenance
content: Clearing the leakage of the butterfly valve and repairing the two main inlet valves of the powerhouse will be taken up. To complete the repair works, the powerhouse will be shut down from  November 11 to December 10

title: Yathindra says his father will complete full term ‘under present circumstances’
content: Yathindra dismissed the rumours about ‘November revolution’ and said there is no discussion on the issue in the party

title: Assam government faces criticism over plan to table report on 1983 Nellie massacre
content: More than 2,000 people were killed in the Nellie incident, which occurred on February 18, 1983, during the peak of the anti-foreigners Assam Agitation; the victims were migrant Muslims, mostly women and children.

title: 75,000 more medical seats to be added at UG/PG level in next five years: Union Health Minister
content: Union Minister J.P. Nadda was addressing the 50th annual convocation ceremony of All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Delhi; he urged the graduating students to actively contribute to academics and research

title: Penna river bund strengthening works moving at fast pace, says Kovur MLA
content: Asks authorities to maintain high vigil along the coast in the constituency to minimise loss of lives and property following cyclone alerts issued by IMD

title: Settle Aarogyasri dues to network hospitals and restore medical services, CPI tells Andhra Pradesh government
content: Thousands of poor patients are left to suffer with the suspension of medical services for the past fortnight, CPI State secretary Eswarayya says in a letter to Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu

title: J&K Rajya Sabha polls: Voted for NC candidates in larger interest of J&K, says jailed AAP MLA Mehraj Malik
content: AAP MLA from Doda said those pretending to be "anti-BJP are the same ones proving their friendship with Sat Sharma".

title: UDF accuses Kochi Mayor of insulting city by not turning up to receive President as per protocol
content: As the first citizen of Kochi and in accordance with protocol, the Mayor should have received the President in his official gown, says UDF

title: Kufos to set up Marine Biology Centre at Kavaratti
content: The new centre will host state-of-the-art laboratories for marine genomics, coral restoration, and blue biotechnology, along with coastal and offshore field research stations

title: How Giannis and the Bucks managed an awkward offseason
content: Giannis Antetokounmpo appeared on a projector screen in the interview room . it was the first day a team could officially gather before the start of training camp . he had come down with COVID the week before and had not been cleared to travel .

title: A well-done steak for Deion, medium for Dabo: How CFB chefs please everyone's palates
content: in 2019, he was the executive chef of the Seattle Seahawks . he had applied for a culinary position with LSU before where he would be working at Tiger Stadium . in his interview, he cooked for 35 people -- executives, dieticians and other high-ranking officials .

title: Buzz: Terry McLaurin ready to roll, Christian Watson on verge of return
content: our fantasy football Buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the league . this looks to be the week that McLaurin returns from the quad injury that has sidelined him since Week 4 . there was some early optimism last week that he might be active in Week 7 after returning to practice .

title: NHL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, plus small-sample superstars
content: a panel of ESPN hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . this week's new edition of the ESPN NHL Power Rankings, we've identified a player on each team who has excelled way beyond expectations thus far .

title: Norris laughs off Red Bull sticky tape 'side quests'
content: the FIA handed Red Bull a €50,000 fine at the u.s. grand prix . a mechanic tried to re-enter the grid once the formationI lap had started to remove tape . the mechanics used tape on the pit wall as a visual aid to ensure his car was not too far forward .

title: Round 1 preview, predictions: Can anyone stop Philly?
content: the 2025 MLS Cup playoffs kicked off on Wednesday with the wild card round, which saw the ninth seeds from both the East and West get knocked out . this phase of the postseason moves quickly, with the dust on Wednesday's Wild Card games having barely settled before inter Miami and Nashville SC get Round 1 underway on Friday night . the 'futbol Americas' crew debate who's the leading contenders to win the MLS cup .

title: 12 more NFL Week 8 games: We have predictions, picks and wild stats
content: Aaron Rodgers faces his former team when the Packers come to town . the Giants and Eagles face off in a classic NFC East showdown . we have a key stat to know and a betting nugget for each contest .

title: Premier League live updates: Matheus Cunha scores first Man United goal
content: We're back with another action-packed weekend of football across Europe! In the  Premier League ,  Manchester United  will be aiming to extend their two-game winning streak against  Brighton & Hove Albion , and  Liverpool  host  Brentford  hoping to bounce back in the league after a commanding performance in the UEFA Champions League in midweek. Earlier,  Chelsea  were stunned by a last-gasp winner from  Sunderland  as they lost 2-1, while the newly promoted side went second. Elsewhere, struggling  Newcastle United  got a huge 2-1 win over  Fulham  at the other end of the table thanks to another last-minute winner from Bruno Guimaraes. In Europe,  Bayern Munich  extended their unbeaten run to 13 in all competitions as beat  Borussia Mönchengladbach  3-0 in the  Bundesliga  with a fine second-half display, and in Italy, a massive  Serie A  showdown sees  Napoli  take on  Internazionale  in a clash between two sides battling for the title. Stay tuned for live updates.

title: 👀 Wetzel: The next betting scandal is coming

title: UConn reveals championship rings designed by Bueckers, Fudd and Ducharme
